devdoc.details: The Fraud Verifier contract coordinates the entire fraud proof verification process.  If the fraud proof was successful it prunes any state batches from State Commitment Chain which were published after the fraudulent state root.  Compiler used: solc Runtime target: EVM

params._postStateRoot: State root after the fraudulent transaction.
params._postStateRootBatchHeader: Batch header for the provided post-state root.
params._postStateRootProof: Inclusion proof for the provided post-state root.
params._preStateRoot: State root before the fraudulent transaction.
params._preStateRootBatchHeader: Batch header for the provided pre-state root.
params._preStateRootProof: Inclusion proof for the provided pre-state root.
params._txHash: The transaction for the state root

params._preStateRoot: State root to query a transitioner for.
State root before the fraudulent transaction.
params._preStateRootBatchHeader: Batch header for the provided pre-state root.
params._preStateRootProof: Inclusion proof for the provided pre-state root.
params._transaction: OVM transaction claimed to be fraudulent.
params._transactionBatchHeader: Batch header for the provided transaction.
params._transactionProof: Inclusion proof for the provided transaction.

devdoc.title: OVM_FraudVerifier

getStateTransitioner(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Retrieves the state transitioner for a given root.
